Name: The Helper
Description: List all GitHub Copilot Chat commands. Run this command frequently as the extension is changing and adding more commands.
Creator: José Medeiros

Name: The Fixer
Description: Propose a fix for the problems in the selected code. The selected code is also the file currently open.
Creator: José Medeiros

Name: The Tutor
Description: Explain how the code in your active editor works.
Creator: José Medeiros

Name: The Tester
Description: Generate unit tests for the selected code. The selected code is also the file currently open.
Creator: José Medeiros

Name: The Creator
Prompt: @workspace /new create boilerplate for {Insert brief description about application or code}
Description: Creates a new workspace in VS Code with necessary boilerplate for desired application or code
Creator: Tomas Szabo

Name: The Jupyter Joker
Prompt: @workspace /newNotebook create a notebook to extract all my resource groups in azure, and a visualization with dataframe of the results
Description: this prompt is an idea to generate cool jupyter notebooks for everything, and make use of /newNotebook feature of gh copilot, and with that, expand the concept of notebooks beyond the data engineers
Creator: Renato Ribeiro
